item.description: We have had alot of fun on our doggie walks so let's try it again! Hopefully some of you are around on this holiday weekend....Let's meet at the icecream stand off of 146 Purgatory Chasm exit off of 146 at around 12:15. Bring your dog if you have one. You do not need a dog to join us. See you there weather permitting!

group.name: WEST OF BOSTON OVER 40 GAY WOMENS MEET-UP

item.name: Women-Dogs-Icecream-Purgatory Chasm
